title.rendered: SSHS Named Among U.S. News & World Report’s Best High Schools

content.rendered:
Saratoga Springs High School has once again been recognized by U.S. News & World Report as one of the nation’s Best High Schools.  View the profile for Saratoga Springs High School.

The 2025 U.S. News rankings evaluated nearly 25,000 public high schools across all 50 states and the District of Columbia. Schools are ranked based on state assessment performance, graduation rates, and college readiness.

Saratoga Springs High School’s graduation rate was 94% for the 2023–2024 school year, surpassing the New York state average. The school continues to make progress, reaching a 96% graduation rate in June 2025.
Based on data from the 2023-2024 school year:
49% of students took at least one AP® exam
38% passed at least one AP® exam
77% mathematics proficiency
89% reading proficiency
85% science proficiency
